item.title: The US-Led World Order Faces a New Challenge
item.description: The US-led world order is facing a new challenge from the BRICS bloc, which is made up of Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa. These countries are all emerging economies with large populations and growing economic clout. They are seeking to challenge the dominance of the US and the European Union in the global economy and geopolitics.
